description: n! times number of posets with n elements.
references: K. K.-H. Butler, A Moore-Penrose inverse for Boolean relation matrices, pp. 18-28 of Combinatorial Mathematics (Proceedings 2nd Australian Conf.), Lect. Notes Math. 403, 1974.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Index entries for sequences related to posets
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
